editable047: At JRS & Associates, we’re doing the things that make our environment a place our associates want to be every day. It’s a warm, contemporary place to work, with lounges to unwind, games to play, a mother’s room, and an Internet cafe to log into the world when off the collections floor. Amenities like these and a commitment to training ensures a dedicated workforce—a team you can count on to be there for the long run. We’d love to introduce you to the people who make it all happen.

editable002: We use strategic collection methods for superior results.
editable003: Success is achieved through  effective tools
editable004: We Have Solutions to your Unpaid Commercial and Consumer Accounts
editable005: With the right collection procedures and a commitment to cutting edge technology, we continually achieve above-average recovery yields. The best way to achieve this objective is through our concerted calling campaigns supplemented by automated skip tracing and third-party notices
editable006: Why More Of Your Customers Pay JRS
editable007: Our collection division is the heart of our services suite. Whether it is a commercial or consumer account our success is achieved through the use of the same effective tools: persistence, diplomacy and an understanding of unique individual and business circumstances.
editable008: To provide outstanding accounts receivable services with the understanding that our reputation, and that of our clients', is more important than collecting any one account.
editable010: Representing Your Business Is Our Priority
editable012: Sometimes when you have a customer that you do not want to ruin the relationship but just need to get paid, we would use diplomatic approach to collecting. Sometimes we can offer some short term alternative financing to help them close the gaps in their business
editable014: On commercial accounts we start the same minute we receive the information to collect.  Instead of like most agencies sending letters before making a real attempt to collect the debt over the phone or in person.
editable016: Sometimes you need a lien filed or perfected.  Other times you need to take legal action.  We have a nationwide network of private investigators and attorneys that we work hand in hand with to identify assets and get you paid.
editable017: Recover more compared to traditional agencies.
editable018: Our results speak for themselves: more paying customers, more payment plans that don’t break, and more kept promises mean we recover more.  Our automated system keeps working the same accounts for as long as possible so payments don’t taper of.

name: Grumpy Cat
description: Tardar Sauce (born April 4, 2012), commonly known as Grumpy Cat, is a cat Internet and media personality and actress. She is known for her permanently "grumpy" facial appearance, which is caused by an underbite and feline dwarfism.

editable028: Our Early-out Receivables management unit handles outsourcing programs which provide a viable, low-cost alternative to internal collection departments. This program is ideal for companies that want to place a focus on cash collections early in the aging process, but don’t have the staff to follow through with an extensive customer list.
